root.name: SimFarm
root.description: SimFarm is a farming simulation that takes the mechanics of SimCity and brings them to the farm. You start with a plot of land and a handful of seeds. It's your job to decide what kind of crops you will grow, how to best maintain those crops, and generate enough money to expand and your farm. Ensure the success of your crops with irrigation, crop rotation, and pesticide proliferation. Also you get to fly a crop duster.Better git to cropdustin'
